means: （旅游公司等）通过保险单（游客）受保护的

sentence.Network_en: What had bonded them instantly and so completely was their similar background.
sentence.Network_cn: 是相似的生活背景使他们很快变得亲密无间。

sentence.Network_en: Strips of wood are bonded together and moulded by machine.
sentence.Network_cn: 木板条被黏合在一起并用机器压模成型。

sentence.Network_en: Silver overlay is bonded to the entire surface.
sentence.Network_cn: 整个表面都镀了一层银。

entry.def: A bonded company has entered into a legal agreement which offers its customers some protection if the company does not fulfil its contract with them.

example.ex: The company is a fully bonded member of the Association of British Travel Agents...
example.tran: 该公司是英国旅行社协会的完全担保会员。

example.ex: The company was not bonded in any way and as such there is no compensation scheme.
example.tran: 该公司没有任何形式的担保，因此没有补偿方案。

sentences.en: The whisky was taken to bonded warehouses at Port Dundee.
sentences.cn: 威士忌酒已送到邓迪港的保稅仓库。

sentences.en: This adhesive must be applied to both surfaces which are to be bonded together.
sentences.cn: 要粘接的两个面都必须涂上这种黏合剂。
